content: Head back to the Squall Hideout Shrine, and this time stay out in the sun to explore the other half of this area. The far right side has several enemies patrolling around, including a shield-bearing Spearbone that has a lot more defense than the Rat Soldier. You’ll want to chip away at the shield with charged heavy strikes until he’s defenseless before Immobilizing him, and dodging the shield charges and bashes.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'The Second Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
Head back to the Squall Hideout Shrine, and this time stay out in the sun to explore the other half of this area. The far right side has several enemies patrolling around, including a shield-bearing Spearbone that has a lot more defense than the Rat Soldier. You’ll want to chip away at the shield with charged heavy strikes until he’s defenseless before Immobilizing him, and dodging the shield charges and bashes.
